actualAirTemperature.description: The approximate temperature of the CCD chip.

actualCCDTemperature.description: The approximate temperature of the CCD chip.

cameraName.description: Name of the used camera. Set to luckyEMCCD, luckyTESTCCD or luckySIMCCD.

commandedCCDTemperature.description: The temperature the CCD is to be cooled down to.
